titleStmt.title: His Holyness the Pope of Rome's declaration against the French king, Louis the 14th. Translated out of High Dutch into English as it now lyes before the Dyet in Germany : giving an exact account of the particulars of the presensions of the See of Rome against the crown of France: / written by a person that is lately arrived from Germany. ; Never yet published ...
titleStmt.author: Alexander VIII, Pope, 1610-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
